snippet: A new federally sponsored program called OneBeat has brought together 32 musicians from 21 countries to write, produce and record original music and take it on the road.
abstract: OneBeat, a two-year State Department initiative administered by the New York new-music organization Bang on a Can, brings together 32 musicians from 21 countries to write, produce and record original music and perform in several cities on the East Coast.
lead_paragraph: A new federally sponsored program called OneBeat has brought together 32 musicians from 21 countries to write, produce and record original music and take it on the road.

headline.seo: U.S. OneBeat Program Melds 32 Musicians From 21 Countries
